pma:database.name: projet4a
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `eleve` ( `nomPrenom` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `dateDeNaissance` date NOT NULL, `classeId` int(11) NOT NULL, `idEleve` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, PRIMARY KEY (`idEleve`), UNIQUE KEY `nomPrenom` (`nomPrenom`,`dateDeNaissance`,`classeId`), KEY `classeId` (`classeId`), CONSTRAINT `eleve_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`classeId`) REFERENCES `classe` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `paramel1` ( `nbEnonce` int(11) NOT NULL, `tempsApparution` double NOT NULL, `nbApparition` int(11) NOT NULL, `multipleApparution` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `nbAparitionSimultanee` int(11) NOT NULL, `enonceDisparait` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `tempsEnonce` double NOT NULL, `idParamEl1` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, PRIMARY KEY (`idParamEl1`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `parameleve` ( `idEleve` int(11) NOT NULL, `idParamEm1` int(11) NOT NULL, `idParamEm2` int(11) NOT NULL, `idParamEl1` int(11) NOT NULL, KEY `idEleve` (`idEleve`), KEY `idParamEm1` (`idParamEm1`), KEY `idParamEm2` (`idParamEm2`), KEY `idParamEl1` (`idParamEl1`), CONSTRAINT `parameleve_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`idEleve`) REFERENCES `eleve` (`idEleve`), CONSTRAINT `parameleve_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`idParamEm1`) REFERENCES `paramem1` (`idParamEm1`), CONSTRAINT `parameleve_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`idParamEm2`) REFERENCES `paramem2` (`idParamEm2`), CONSTRAINT `parameleve_ibfk_4` FOREIGN KEY (`idParamEl1`) REFERENCES `paramel1` (`idParamEl1`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `paramem1` ( `nbBornes` int(11) NOT NULL, `nbQuestions` int(11) NOT NULL, `disparition` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `tempsRestantApparant` double NOT NULL, `ordreApparition` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `borneSelectionnable` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `borneEqualsOp` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `valMax` int(11) NOT NULL, `frise` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `idParamEm1` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, PRIMARY KEY (`idParamEm1`), KEY `idParamEm1` (`idParamEm1`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `paramem2` ( `typeRep` int(11) NOT NULL, `nbCalcul` int(11) NOT NULL, `valMaxOperande` int(11) NOT NULL, `nombrePair` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `nombreImpair` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `typeNombre` int(11) NOT NULL, `repDeuxBornes` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `repQuatreBornes` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `repPaveNum` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `idParamEm2` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, PRIMARY KEY (`idParamEm2`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `souscompetence` ( `idSousCompetence` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nomSousCompetence` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `descriptionSousCompetence` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `idCompetence` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idSousCompetence`), KEY `idCompetence` (`idCompetence`), CONSTRAINT `souscompetence_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`idCompetence`) REFERENCES `competence` (`idCompetence`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=31 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `souscompetenceeleve` ( `idEleve` int(11) NOT NULL, `idSousCompetence` int(11) NOT NULL, `progression` float NOT NULL, `nbTest` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idEleve`,`idSousCompetence`), KEY `idEleve` (`idEleve`,`idSousCompetence`), KEY `idSousCompetence` (`idSousCompetence`), CONSTRAINT `souscompetenceeleve_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`idEleve`) REFERENCES `eleve` (`idEleve`), CONSTRAINT `souscompetenceeleve_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`idSousCompetence`) REFERENCES `souscompetence` (`idSousCompetence`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
